description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests to set MoCA configuration parameters on a device, including input validation, session management, and invoking setStr commands to apply configuration settings.

methods.name: session_start
methods.description: Starts a new session or resumes existing one.

methods.name: json_decode
methods.description: Decodes a JSON string into a PHP array.

methods.name: isValInArray
methods.description: Checks if a value is within a provided array of valid options.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a configuration parameter for the MoCA interface.
